body: You utilize high-tech firearms to maximum effect.
name: Technology Adept
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Technology in the world/Feats/Technology Adept

sections.body: Dex 13, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (firearms), Point-Blank Shot
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: When you attack with a technological firearm that consumes charges, the save DC of any effect caused by that firearm increases by 1. If your bonuses from Point-Blank Shot apply, it increases by 2 instead.
sections.name: Benefit
